title: Compare treatment of Germany post WWI and WWII

content.question: Directions: The suggested planning and writing time for the question below is 35 minutes. Make sure that you are best prepared to answer the question thoroughly in the time permitted. You should spend 5 minutesWrite an essay that:Has a relevant thesis.Addresses all parts of the question.Supports thesis with specific evidence.Is well organized.Compare and contrast the victorious Allied powers’ treatment of Germany after the First World War with their treatment of Germany after the Second World War. Analyze the reasons for the similarities and differences.
